DataElement.preferredName: Additional New Primary Tumor To Report Ind
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A response used to determine whether there is an additional finding indicating the development of a tumor in a patient with a history of a previously diagnosed tumor with a different histopathologic profile in another anatomic site as compared to the most recent one to report.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Additional New Primary Tumor To Report
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Added; extra; further._A finding indicating the development of a tumor in a patient with a history of a previously diagnosed tumor with a different histopathologic profile in another anatomic site as compared to the most recent one._Used as a function word to indicate direction, purpose, or movement._A short textual account; having provided a short account.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Specification of human conditions relevant to cancer. This includes observations, test results, history, and other concepts relevant to characterization of human cancer-related conditions. Non-neoplastic conditions of interest are also included.

DataElementConcept.origin: ECOG CRF:Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group Case Report Form

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no.

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of either yes or no.
